lsag = await LSAG.deployed()
await lsag.verify('0x45544820666f7220796f7520616e642065766572796f6e6521' , ['0x8febeab5b9430a6b9476751afe74d8af835b08993ef7cef49e1aa903827f7c0c', '0x5577a7ca4bad1e063e2a5182aac10a30cada371621991074c020c25e37385b29', '0x122473f7b07550a80f10372678fc523af23126971c36e00c857f8b3451d70201', '0xbbca3054c76d2b095ab22734e3c8530f40ffa2f3b94406971d5f28c58b8f86d1', '0x1dff8efdd0c27648af1778bd8c0ef938bd6847ea8035ad214abf65b4f975df2a', '0x742b79827f94993c5ad645fa80c2260e2f0698e9f0cad332dce049ec734fcad2', '0x954e39c8f9fc66ca3aa9b82fb613babada8bde25c6d07b2fb9ef7633db5aac7d', '0xc98b566cf3baca38034d4f943fce3e8081302dabd03ed3428abaaaf58f77e397', '0x944219e79081fd70c5ec0156d640a4a6d863cd521e15302d04eb4d321f315448', '0x9a9771ec90e8a24c26c8462b3dd633ff2a062d73ec06eccf5d50162e5499ba9b'], ['0x03', '0x02', '0x03', '0x02', '0x03'])


await lsag.verify('0x45544820666f7220796f7520616e642065766572796f6e6521' , ['0x8febeab5b9430a6b9476751afe74d8af835b08993ef7cef49e1aa903827f7c0c', '0x122473f7b07550a80f10372678fc523af23126971c36e00c857f8b3451d70201', '0xbbca3054c76d2b095ab22734e3c8530f40ffa2f3b94406971d5f28c58b8f86d1', '0x1dff8efdd0c27648af1778bd8c0ef938bd6847ea8035ad214abf65b4f975df2a', '0x742b79827f94993c5ad645fa80c2260e2f0698e9f0cad332dce049ec734fcad2', '0x954e39c8f9fc66ca3aa9b82fb613babada8bde25c6d07b2fb9ef7633db5aac7d', '0xc98b566cf3baca38034d4f943fce3e8081302dabd03ed3428abaaaf58f77e397', '0x944219e79081fd70c5ec0156d640a4a6d863cd521e15302d04eb4d321f315448'], ['0x03', '0x02', '0x03', '0x02'], { gas: 6500000 })
